Right middle ear exploration with a Gold.context: Right middle ear exploration with a Goldenberg TORP reconstruction.

Right profound mixed sensorineural condu.context: Postoperative Diagnosis: Right profound mixed sensorineural conductive hearing loss.

stapes fixation.context: At surgery, she was found to have a mobile malleus handle, but her stapes was fixed by otosclerosis.

otosclerosis.context: At surgery, she was found to have a mobile malleus handle, but her stapes was fixed by otosclerosis.

mobile malleus handle.context: At surgery, she was found to have a mobile malleus handle, but her stapes was fixed by otosclerosis.

stapes was fixed by otosclerosis.context: At surgery, she was found to have a mobile malleus handle, but her stapes was fixed by otosclerosis.

no specific round window niche.context: There was no specific round window niche.

minute crevice.context: There was a very minute crevice; however, exploration of this area did not reveal a niche to a round window membrane.

TORP prosthesis.context: The patient had a type of TORP prosthesis, which had tilted off the footplate anteriorly underneath the malleus handle.

tilted off the footplate anteriorly.context: The patient had a type of TORP prosthesis, which had tilted off the footplate anteriorly underneath the malleus handle.

underneath the malleus handle.context: The patient had a type of TORP prosthesis, which had tilted off the footplate anteriorly underneath the malleus handle.

placed on the footplate.context: A different style of Goldenberg TORP was placed on the footplate underneath the cartilage support in hopes of transferring some sound conduction from the tympanic membrane to the footplate.

cartilage support.context: A different style of Goldenberg TORP was placed on the footplate underneath the cartilage support in hopes of transferring some sound conduction from the tympanic membrane to the footplate.

Gelfoam in the middle ear.context: The fit was secure and supported with Gelfoam in the middle ear.

tympanomeatal flap was returned to anato.context: The tympanomeatal flap was returned to anatomic position supported with Gelfoam saturated Ciprodex.

Gelfoam saturated Ciprodex.context: The tympanomeatal flap was returned to anatomic position supported with Gelfoam saturated Ciprodex.

incision was closed with #4-0 Vicryl.context: The incision was closed with #4-0 Vicryl and individual #5-0 nylon to the skin, and a sterile dressing was applied.

individual #5-0 nylon to the skin.context: The incision was closed with #4-0 Vicryl and individual #5-0 nylon to the skin, and a sterile dressing was applied.

sterile dressing was applied.context: The incision was closed with #4-0 Vicryl and individual #5-0 nylon to the skin, and a sterile dressing was applied.

Less than 5 cc.context: Estimated Blood Loss: Less than 5 cc.

consented to revision surgery.context: The patient consented to revision surgery because of the profound hearing loss in her right ear.

profound hearing loss in her right ear.context: The patient consented to revision surgery because of the profound hearing loss in her right ear.

unclear from her previous operative reco.context: It was unclear from her previous operative records and CT scan as to whether or not she was a reconstruction candidate.

CT scan.context: It was unclear from her previous operative records and CT scan as to whether or not she was a reconstruction candidate.

reconstruction candidate.context: It was unclear from her previous operative records and CT scan as to whether or not she was a reconstruction candidate.

stapes fixation as well as otosclerosis.context: She had reports of stapes fixation as well as otosclerosis on her CT scan.
